code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[properties,setProperties]=useState([]);const[filters,setFilters]=useState({price:"",bedrooms:""});useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/properties").then(res=>{setProperties(res.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error fetching properties:",error);});},[]);const applyFilters=prop=>{return(filters.price===""||prop.price<=filters.price)&&(filters.bedrooms===""||prop.bedrooms===parseInt(filters.bedrooms));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Property Listings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filters",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Max Price",onChange:e=>setFilters({...filters,price:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Bedrooms",onChange:e=>setFilters({...filters,bedrooms:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"listings",children:properties.filter(applyFilters).map(property=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:property.image_url,alt:property.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:property.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",property.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Location: ",property.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Bedrooms: ",property.bedrooms]})]},property.id||property.name))})]});}export default App;
